sourcesContent:
# Name URL Category Language Keywords Actions
{{ bookmark.id }} {{ bookmark.name }} {{ bookmark.url }} {{ bookmark.category }} {{ bookmark.language }} {{ bookmark.keywords }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Bookmark } from '../Models/bookmark.interface'; import { BookmarkService } from '../Services/bookmark.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { bookmarks: Bookmark[] = []; constructor(private bookmarkService: BookmarkService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchBookmarks(); } fetchBookmarks(): void { this.bookmarkService.getBookmarks().subscribe( (bookmarks: Bookmark[]) => { this.bookmarks = bookmarks; }, (error) => { console.error('Error fetching bookmarks:', error); } ); } deleteBookmark(bookmarkId: number): void { this.bookmarkService.deleteBookmark(bookmarkId).subscribe( () => { this.fetchBookmarks(); }, (error) => { console.error('Error deleting bookmark:', error); } ); } }
